go_data.justification: PNG1 encodes a soluble protein that exhibits PNGase activity when expressed in Escherichia coli.
PNG1 may be required for efficient proteasome-mediated degradation of a misfolded glycoprotein.
Subcellular localization studies indicate that Png1p is present in the nucleus as well as the cytosol.
Subcellular localization studies indicate that Png1p is present in the nucleus as well as the cytosol.
